pages.text: I find myself in a new world, one teeming with mysteries. Surely there are materials - likely crystalline - that I can leverage to meaningfully understand them. Where might I encounter those?

pages.title: Gemstone Shards
pages.text: Lurking high in mountains, sealed deep in the earth, and embedded in the middle of the world, these strange shards lay shielded away, fresh for the taking. With these, my understanding of the world and the forces that drive it can take shape.
